text: Na hiyaram Ami ko siran a manga Yahodi so oman i adn a kanoko niyan, go so sapi go so kambing, na hiyaram Ami kiran so manga sibo a dowa oto, inonta so kaa-awidan o manga likod a dowa oto, odi na so manga tinai, odi na so minilook ko tolan: Giyoto man i inibadal Ami kiran sabap ko kiyandarowaka iran: Na mataan! a Skami i titho a manga bnar
